welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Upper Arlington, where charming neighborhoods and friendly faces await you! Explore our vibrant community known for its beautiful parks, lively culture, and delicious dining options. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in our city."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ohio State University Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and corporate flights at Ohio State University Airport.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Port Columbus International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves American Airlines and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C serves United Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rickenbacker Airport serves all commercial and cargo flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rickenbacker Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
